title: Romantic Cairns Beachside Eco-Escape with Dining Inclusions
description: Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of Tropical North Queensland at the Kewarra Beach Resort & Spa, situated just 15km from Cairns City on the Northern Beaches. Stay in a tropical bungalow that fits seamlessly into its natural rainforest surroundings, with easy access to the Tablelands, Port Douglas and the Great Barrier Reef. Includes daily continental breakfast, AU$50 food and beverage credit, a tropical juice and bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, scheduled beach yoga, Pilates and Tai Chi sessions and more.
